title: SVN
summary: Apache Subversion (SVN) is a free source control management (SCM) system. It allows developers to keep a history of text and code modifications. Although SVN can also handle binary files, we do not recommend that you use it for such files.

parents.title: MDN Web Docs Glossary: Definitions of Web-related terms
